member.name: T:MediatR.Extensions.Microsoft.AspNetCore.AspNetCoreMediatRServiceCollectionExtensions

member.summary: Registers MediatR which is configured to use the HttpContext.RequestAborted CancellationToken in ASP.NET Core Environments, and scans the provided assemblies for handlers and requests
